Description: W.R. Berkley Corp., Admiral Risk Insurance Services, and Admiral Insurance agreed to pay a total of $12 million ($6 million suspended) in penalties, plus costs, in settlement of allegations they violated state regulations related to surplus lines brokerage licensing requirements.

W.R. Berkley Corp., Admiral Risk Insurance Services, and Admiral Insurance agreed to pay a total of $12 million ($6 million suspended) in penalties, plus costs, in settlement of allegations they violated state regulations related to surplus lines brokerage licensing requirements.

$10,000 fine for using incorrect Fire Protection Class codes, incorrect Specific vs. Class rates, incorrect Construction Type loss cost, incorrect Class Rate Loss Costs, having IRPM worksheets that were either missing or incorrectly applied. RCW 48.19.040(6); WAC 284-24-100(8)(a); WAC 284-24-100(8)
Agency: Washington State Office of the Insurance Commissioner
